Question: This person has estimated that he studied about 1000 hours during his three years at Oxford.
Hints: This person's first book The Large Scale Structure of Space-Time written with George Ellis was published in 1973.
In 1969, this person accepted a specially created 'Fellowship for Distinction in Science' to remain at Caius.
As it was not possible to read mathematics there at the time, this person decided to study physics and chemistry.
